net.datacrow.core.clients

Interface IBackupRestoreClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClient

    public interface IBackupRestoreClient
extends IClient
    A backup listener will be updated on events and errors during the backup process. Additionally the Backup process will ask for information from the client.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals
